name: Bombardment
description:
Bombardment version 1
Developed for "My First Game Jam"
http://itch.io/jam/my-first-game-jam

big thanks to all my friends

Art/Programming/Story/Writing by @cicadian
Sound/Music by @ironflamberge

Bombardment is an arcade style defense game where you shoot down asteroids from a planetary surface.

To navigate the title screen use the UP and DOWN arrow keys, Z to select.
To proceed in dialogue press Z
To select your weapons for the bases use the arrow keys
To upgrade the bases press Z
To downgrade press X
Pressing Enter will engage the defense systems and begin the round

If too many meteors hit your shields its game over!

To use your weapons aim the cursor with your mouse.
Left Click fires the left base
Middle Click fires the middle base
Right Click fires the right base

all weapons have a cycle time, there's counters on the bottom right.

Known Bugs:

Having more than 1 Level2 or higher SEEKER base will not permit more than one base to fire.

RAILGUN level 2 or higher sweeps do not spawn from the correct base.

Pressing up or Down occasionally does nothing when changing weapon selections

Balance changes are needed.
